import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Done from '../../Components/Loans/Done' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default function LoanManeger() { const[loanName,setLoanName]=useState() const[loanPrice,setLoanPrice]=useState() const[loanDebt,setLoanDebt]=useState() const[loanInfo,setLoanInfo]=useState() const [loanData, setLoanData] = useState([]) const [done,setDone]=useState(false) console.log(loanData) const loanRequest=()=>{ const clone = [...loanData] clone.push( { loanName, loanPrice, loanDebt, loanInfo } ) setLoanData(clone) setDone(true) console.log(loanData) } const closeDone= ()=>{ setDone(false) } return ( <> { done ? : null }
